errors.errormsg: A snapshot policy is required for stream_snap policy
errors.workaround: Currently, it is not allowed to create the mirror (stream snap) policy without first creating the snapshot policy, however when a direct to onvault policy is added to the template, an add button for the mirror policy is enabled
